name: Net Aspect
overview:
Netaspect are a highly skilled software development and IT consultancy house based in Yorkshire, UK that thrives on solving difficult problems, ensuring our customers benefit from the innovative solutions we deliver.

In addition to consultancy services, Net Aspect provide the following software products.

Flex Planner is a web based time recording and flexi time sheet system for use by computer based staff. The software enables employees to record time worked via an easy-to-use web interface and ensures staff do not falsify their working hours.

Sentiman collects and analyses internet sentiment for shares on the London AIM stock market. The system analyses sentiment on blogs, web sites and discussion groups daily. The goal of the project is to highlight shares that other people are interested in so you can check them out and see if you find them of interest yourself
